popjava.base
Class POPException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          popjava.base.POPException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, IPOPBase
public class POPException
extends java.lang.Exception
implements IPOPBase

This class is the base implementation for all POP exception

See Also:
